thread.section_title: Mabel's Labels Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Mabel's Labels | mabelslabels.com
thread.title: Ros B.
thread.title_full: Mabel's Labels reviewed by Ros B.

author: Ros B.
title: Ros B.
text:
I purchased my first combo pack of labels several years ago when my eldest was a toddler - AMAZING product that lasts! I'm still finding bearing the labels, after years of washing!
Despite my eldest daughter now being 12, our need for labeling items continues! The labels are so pretty that my girls prefer them to any hand marked attempts, and so durable to we've even used them on my eldest's downhill skis, poles, helmet and goggles!
I also purchased a set a large labels for our recycling bins - the labels are going strong despite the bins falling apart - winter after winter, with no peeling or fading.
We strongly recommend any of these great products!
